comment._content: He figured out how to get the easy job.

comment.author: 21891888@N00
comment._content: the old "heave ho". wonderful collection, thank you.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: On this History page of the SEDOV there is a slide show of contemporary photos of the MAGDALENE VINNEN with accompaniment of a German sea song with accordion - maybe what they sounded like? - www.sts-sedov.info/eng/history/

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] ooooh just got to this now. Do you reckon it could be a recording from that time? Perhaps it is worth us contacting them to find out where that sound recording came from! What a record if it is! Love it, thanks so much for pointing us to it.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] No I don't think it is an old recording, but certainly an old song which gives an idea of what a German male chorus with accordion accompaniment sounded like.
